title: Google Chrome will soon have a new icon with platform-specific changes
content:
Google Chrome is one of the most important software projects in modern history, and its icon is instantly recognizable across desktop and mobile devices. The core concept of a blue circle surrounded by three pinwheel-like slices has remained the same since the first release in 2008, but it has evolved over the years, and now

The post Google Chrome will soon have a new icon with platform-specific changes appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google is starting to test a new icon for Google Chrome, with a less-noticable shadow and platform-specific design tweaks.
